name: extraordinarily
content:

Add to word list
B2 very; more than usual: She is, it must be said, extraordinarily beautiful.
More examplesFewer examplesHe is an extraordinarily talented sculptor, who works with the most ordinary materials.It really is extraordinarily cold out there, so please wrap up warm.
